name: Crashing Cube
description:
Controls: Move sideways with Arrow keys or A/D

Endless Racing Game - Avoid obstacles and traps and build up your score!

You race as cube in an endless random-generated level. Different objects from blocks over slime to traps will prevent you from coming further. Avoid objects and don't fall off the track into darkness.

Improve your reaction time and beat yourself again and again in higher difficulties and score.

Have fun playing!
